landing.title: DoveNet | Pigeon Management System & Pedigree Creator
landing.description: The ultimate pigeon management system. Track your pigeons, manage lofts, and create, print, and download professional pedigrees instantly.
landing.keywords: pigeon management, racing pigeons, pedigrees, create pedigrees, print pedigrees, download pedigrees, loft tracking, pigeon breeding

about.title: About DoveNet | Pigeon Racing Software
about.description: Learn about DoveNet's mission to modernize pigeon racing. We provide tools to manage pigeons, track results, and generate pedigrees.
about.keywords: about dovenet, pigeon racing software, pigeon management team, loft management

contact.title: Contact DoveNet | Pigeon Management Support
contact.description: Contact DoveNet support for help with pigeon tracking, pedigree generation, or account management.
contact.keywords: contact support, pigeon software help, dovenet support, pigeon tracking questions

landingPage.heroSubtitle: The all-in-one platform for pigeon fanciers. Track pedigrees, manage breeding, analyze competition results, and more.
landingPage.featuresSubtitle: From hatching to racing, DoveNet provides the tools to manage every aspect of your pigeon loft.

feature1.title: Loft Management
feature1.description: Organize your pigeons into specific lofts. Track capacity, location, and occupancy with ease.

feature2.title: Competition Tracking
feature2.description: Record race results, calculate velocities, and analyze performance trends over time.

feature3.title: Health & Inventory
feature3.description: Keep track of vaccinations, treatments, and feed inventory to ensure your flock stays healthy.

feature4.title: Pedigree Generation
feature4.description: Automatically generate professional pedigrees. Trace lineage back multiple generations instantly.

feature5.title: Breeding Management
feature5.description: Plan pairings, track eggs and hatchlings, and monitor the success rates of your breeding couples.

feature6.title: Secure & Cloud-Based
feature6.description: Access your data from anywhere, on any device. Your data is backed up and secure.

landingPage.pricingSubtitle: Start for free, upgrade when you need more power.
landingPage.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of fanciers who trust DoveNet for their pigeon management.
landingPage.footerDescription: DoveNet is the leading platform for modern pigeon fanciers, combining tradition with technology to help you achieve the best results.

aboutPage.title: About DoveNet
aboutPage.subtitle: Empowering pigeon fanciers with modern technology to preserve tradition and achieve excellence.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide the most comprehensive, user-friendly, and reliable management platform for pigeon enthusiasts worldwide, helping them focus on what they love most‚Äîtheir birds.
aboutPage.storyText: Born from a passion for pigeon racing and software engineering, DoveNet was created to solve the challenges of manual record-keeping. We understand the dedication required to maintain a top-tier loft.
aboutPage.valuesText: We believe in transparency, community, and continuous improvement. We listen to our users and constantly evolve our platform to meet the changing needs of the sport.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At DoveNet, we take your privacy seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to DoveNet ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website at https://www.dovenet.eu (the "Service").

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content:
We may collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other contact details when you provide them to us.
  • Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers, and other technical information.
  • Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, including pages visited, time spent, and interaction patterns.
  • Cookies and Tracking Data: Information collected through cookies, web beacons, and similar tracking technologies.
  • Payment Information: Credit card details, billing address, and transaction history when you make purchases.
  • Location Data: Approximate geographic location based on your IP address or precise location if you grant permission.

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
We use the collected information for the following purposes:

  • To provide, operate, and maintain our website and services
  • To improve, personalize, and expand our website
  • To understand and analyze how you use our website
  • To develop new products, services, features, and functionality
  • To communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners
  • To process your transactions and manage your orders
  • To find and prevent fraud
  • To comply with legal obligations

sections.title: 4. Third-Party Services
sections.content:
We may use third-party services that collect, monitor, and analyze data. These services include:

  • Google Analytics: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and usage patterns. Google Analytics may collect information such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
  • Email Marketing Services: We use email marketing platforms to send newsletters and promotional materials.
  • Payment Processors: We use secure third-party payment processors to handle transactions.

sections.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with small amounts of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.

You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our website.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: The security of your personal information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

sections.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights
sections.content:
Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

  • The right to access your personal information
  • The right to correct or update your personal information
  • The right to delete your personal information
  • The right to restrict processing of your personal information
  • The right to data portability
  • The right to object to processing
  • The right to withdraw consent

GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)

If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional data protection rights under the GDPR.

CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act)

If you are a California resident, you have specific rights regarding your personal information under the CCPA.

sections.title: 8. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13.

sections.title: 9. International Data Transfers
sections.content: Your information, including personal data, may be transferred to and maintained on computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction.

sections.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

sections.title: 11. Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • By email: dovenet.info@gmail.com
  • On our website: https://www.dovenet.eu

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: By accessing or using DoveNet, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using DoveNet ("we," "our," or "us") and our website at https://www.dovenet.eu (the "Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement ("Terms of Service"). If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: DoveNet provides software as a service (SaaS) solutions and related technology services through our website and related services. Our Service allows users to access and use our platform in accordance with these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 3. Age Requirements
sections.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use our Service. By using our Service, you represent and warrant that you are at least 13 years of age. If you are under 13, you may not use our Service.

sections.title: 4. User Accounts
sections.content:
To access certain features of our Service, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for:

  • Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
  • All activities that occur under your account
  • Providing accurate and complete information
  • Updating your information to keep it current
  • Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 5. User-Generated Content
sections.content:
Our Service may allow you to post, upload, or submit content ("User Content"). By submitting User Content, you:

  • Retain ownership of your intellectual property rights
  • Grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content in connection with our Service
  • Represent that you have the right to submit such content
  • Agree that your content does not violate any third-party rights

We reserve the right to remove any User Content that violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable.

sections.title: 6. Prohibited Uses
sections.content:
You may not use our Service for any of the following prohibited activities:

  • Any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
  • Posting or transmitting harmful, offensive, obscene, abusive, invasive of privacy, defamatory, hateful or otherwise objectionable content
  • Sending spam, unsolicited communications, or engaging in other forms of commercial solicitation
  • Infringing upon or violating our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
  • Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our Service or related systems or networks
  • Impersonating any person or entity or falsely stating or misrepresenting your affiliation with a person or entity
  • Using our Service for unauthorized commercial purposes
  • Using automated means, including spiders, robots, crawlers, or data mining tools to download data from our Service

We reserve the right to terminate your access to our Service for violating any of these prohibited uses.

sections.title: 7. Payment Terms
sections.content:
If you purchase products or services through our Service, the following payment terms apply:

  • All fees are stated in EURO and are non-refundable unless otherwise specified
  • You agree to pay all charges incurred by you or any users of your account
  • You are responsible for all applicable taxes
  • We reserve the right to change our fees at any time
  • Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis
  • You may cancel your subscription at any time, but no refunds will be provided for partial periods
  • Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled

sections.title: 8. Third-Party Services
sections.content:
Our Service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by DoveNet. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services.

You acknowledge and agree that DoveNet shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such websites or services.

sections.title: 9. API Usage
sections.content:
If you access our Service through our API, additional terms apply:

  • You must comply with our API documentation and usage guidelines
  • We may impose rate limits and usage restrictions
  • We reserve the right to modify or discontinue API access at any time
  • You may not use our API to compete with our Service

sections.title: 10. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DoveNet and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent.

sections.title: 11. Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content:
The information on this Service is provided on an "as is" basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, this Company:

  • Excludes all representations and warranties relating to this Service and its contents
  • Does not warrant that the functions contained in this Service will be uninterrupted or error-free
  • Does not warrant that defects will be corrected, or that this Service or the server that makes it available are free of viruses or bugs
  • Does not warrant the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any information

sections.title: 12. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall DoveNet, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, punitive, special, or consequential damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the Service.

sections.title: 13. Indemnification
sections.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless DoveNet and its licensee and licensors, and their employees, contractors, agents, officers and directors, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees).

sections.title: 14. Termination
sections.content:
We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever and without limitation, including but not limited to a breach of the Terms.

If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the Service.

sections.title: 15. Dispute Resolution
sections.content: Before pursuing formal dispute resolution, we encourage you to contact us directly to seek a resolution.

sections.title: 16. Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the applicable jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.title: 17. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

sections.title: 18. Severability
sections.content: If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect.

sections.title: 19. Entire Agreement
sections.content: These Terms constitute the sole and entire agreement between you and DoveNet regarding the Service and supersede all prior and contemporaneous understandings, agreements, representations, and warranties.

sections.title: 20. Assignment
sections.content: You may not assign or transfer these Terms, by operation of law or otherwise, without our prior written consent. We may assign these Terms at any time without notice.

sections.title: 21. Electronic Communications
sections.content: By using our Service, you consent to receiving electronic communications from us. These communications may include notices about your account and information concerning or related to our Service.

sections.title: 22. Contact Information
sections.content:
If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

  • Email: dovenet.info@gmail.com
  • Website: https://www.dovenet.eu

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.

sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your browser or device by websites, apps, online media, and advertisements. They are used for a variety of purposes, such as remembering your preferences, analyzing website traffic, and providing personalized content and advertisements.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies on https://www.dovenet.eu to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website performance, and provide personalized content. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies we use and how we use them.

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content:
We use the following types of cookies on our website:

  • Necessary Cookies: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. Without these cookies, the website cannot function properly.
  • Preferences Cookies: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language, or region) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
  • Analytics Cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our website's performance and user experience.
  • Marketing Cookies: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display ads that are relevant and engaging for individual users. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we use.
  • Social Media Cookies: These cookies are set by social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks.
  • Functional Cookies: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your settings and preferences.

sections.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content:
We may use third-party services that set cookies on our website. These services include:

  • Google Analytics: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and usage patterns. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information about how visitors use our site.
  • Stripe, Gmail login (OAuth): Third-party service that may use cookies for various purposes.

sections.title: 5. Cookie Consent
sections.content: When you first visit our website, you will see a cookie consent banner that allows you to accept or decline non-essential cookies. You can change your cookie preferences at any time by accessing the cookie settings on our website.

sections.title: 6. Managing Cookies
sections.content:
You have several options for managing cookies:

  • Browser Settings: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent.
  • Third-Party Opt-Out: You can opt out of third-party cookies by visiting the respective service provider's privacy settings.
  • Our Cookie Settings: You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie settings panel, which can be accessed at any time.

Please note that if you choose to disable cookies, some features of our website may not function properly, and your user experience may be limited.

sections.title: 7. Cookie Retention
sections.content:
Different cookies have different retention periods:

  • Session Cookies: These are temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser.
  • Persistent Cookies: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them manually.
  • Third-Party Cookies: The retention period for third-party cookies is determined by the respective service providers.

sections.title: 8. GDPR Compliance
sections.content:
If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain rights regarding your personal data under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):

  • The right to be informed about data collection and use
  • The right to access your personal data
  • The right to rectify inaccurate data
  • The right to erase your personal data
  • The right to restrict processing
  • The right to data portability
  • The right to object to processing

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

sections.title: 10. Changes to This Cookie Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a new effective date.

sections.title: 11. Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy or our use of cookies, please contact us:

  • Email: dovenet.info@gmail.com
  • Website: https://www.dovenet.eu
